name: Cavalcade (will jobst)
description:
Welcome, driver, to TORQ: CAVALCADE. Inside, you’ll find licenses, registration, reststop, and reststop points of interest, and a few special items, all that you made possible with your generous contribution to the crowdfunding campaign of this game.

Featuring: the driftsome FLICK, the salt-tinged SWAB, and the spray-can bandolier'd GRAF, in such reststops as the LOUD MTN. RADIO ZONE, HALSEMA IRON RAPIDS, or the legendary EGNATIA DOWNHILL, and more!
